<script>
function filterPublications() {
  const searchInput = document.getElementById('pubSearch').value.toLowerCase();
  const items = document.querySelectorAll('.pub-item');
  let visibleCount = 0;
  
  items.forEach(item => {
    const keywords = item.getAttribute('data-keywords') || '';
    const title = item.querySelector('.pub-title')?.textContent || '';
    const authors = item.querySelector('.pub-authors')?.textContent || '';
    const description = item.querySelector('.pub-description')?.textContent || '';
    
    const searchText = (keywords + ' ' + title + ' ' + authors + ' ' + description).toLowerCase();
    
    if (searchText.includes(searchInput) || searchInput === '') {
      item.style.display = 'block';
      visibleCount++;
    } else {
      item.style.display = 'none';
    }
  });
  
  if (visibleCount === 0) {
    showNoResults();
  }
}

function filterByType(type) {
  const buttons = document.querySelectorAll('.filter-btn');
  const items = document.querySelectorAll('[data-type]');
  
  // Update active button
  buttons.forEach(btn => btn.classList.remove('active'));
  event.target.classList.add('active');
  
  // Filter items
  items.forEach(item => {
    if (type === 'all' || item.getAttribute('data-type') === type) {
      item.style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      item.style.display = 'none';
    }
  });
}

function showNoResults() {
  const existing = document.querySelector('.no-results');
  if (!existing) {
    const noResults = document.createElement('div');
    noResults.className = 'no-results';
    noResults.innerHTML = '<h3>No publications found</h3><p>Try adjusting your search terms or filters</p>';
    document.querySelector('.pubs-container').appendChild(noResults);
  }
}
</script>
